thread.title: Atlanta Wins Golden Globe, Donald Glover Thanks Migos For “Bad And Boujee”
thread.title_full: Atlanta Wins Golden Globe, Donald Glover Thanks Migos For “Bad And Boujee”

author: Peter Helman
title: Atlanta Wins Golden Globe, Donald Glover Thanks Migos For “Bad And Boujee”
text:
9:05 pm   
Donald Glover’s FX show Atlanta , which is great , just won the Golden Globe for Best Television Series – Musical Or Comedy at tonight’s ceremony in Beverly Hills, beating out Transparent , Black-ish , Veep , and Mozart In The Jungle . In his acceptance speech, Glover thanked the cast, director Hiro Murai, the city of Atlanta, and Migos —“not for being on the show, but for making ‘ Bad And Boujee .'” Watch his speech below. Watch @DonaldGlover accept Best Comedy Series at the #GoldenGlobes : "I couldn't be here without Atlanta" https://t.co/rqs8IjEEZO pic.twitter.com/g7ZYaT6epR
